settings.codedesc: Type in the opening and closing BBCode tags.
settings.posdesc: The greater the number, the more to the right the cursor will appear.
settings.icondesc: Enter the Font Awesome class name.
settings.introdesc: Set up and save these settings before attempting to use. This extension adds a new button to the editor toolbar. It was built to allow one to insert a custom BBCode. However, feel free to use your imagination. Use it to insert custom Markdown or a common phrase.
